title: tampering
extract: Tampering may refer to: Tampering (crime), intentional modification of products in a way that would make them harmful to the consumer. Tampering with evidence, a form of criminal falsification. Witness tampering, an illegal attempt to coerce witnesses called to testify in a legal proceeding.
extract_html: Tampering may refer to: Tampering (crime), intentional modification of products in a way that would make them harmful to the consumer. Tampering with evidence, a form of criminal falsification. Witness tampering, an illegal attempt to coerce witnesses called to testify in a legal proceeding.
